extension.summary: Complete streaming solution with TMDB, GitHub, Cocoscrapers, Debrid & Watchlist
extension.description: MovieStream Pro is the ultimate Kodi addon featuring: TMDB metadata integration, GitHub custom databases, Cocoscrapers for streaming sources, Real-Debrid/Premiumize support, watchlist/favorites management, TV show support with seasons/episodes, subtitle integration, and advanced video player features. Stream movies and TV shows with professional metadata and multiple source options.
extension.news: v2.0.0: Added TV shows, debrid services, watchlist, favorites, enhanced UI
